item.title: The Crystal Obelisk Initiative: Clean Energy Infrastructure from Canada to Argentina 🔋🏗️🌈
item.description: Spanning continents and ideologies, the rise of clean energy megastructures—from smart stadiums to power-positive obelisks—offers a radical new construction mandate for the Americas. A surplus in renewable energy unlocks a wave of empowerment, decentralized sports economies, and rainbow-casting obelisks that electrify both cities and spirits.
